on since slashing

  finally he knew=
 where he was going. He decided to try an visit the 
  bridge.

On his way he ran into Valtron. "Are you new here?"

ron::

me time 
  and had yet to find Dark Prime. The Wolf creature had run past h=
im, 
  but he had decided not to follow. He was still trying to refind the =

  sent of Dark Prime, but couldn't.
